abilities.name: Malign Presence
abilities.rule:
If this model is your **WARLORD**, each time your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem, if that unit is within 12" of this model, increase the cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

***Designer’s Note**: This ability takes precedence over the Lord of Deceit ability presented in the Balance Dataslate June 2024.*

abilities.name: Domination of the Hive Mind
abilities.rule: While a friendly **TYRANIDS** unit is within 9" of this model, that unit is within your army’s Synapse Range.

abilities.name: Hive Commander
abilities.rule: At the start of your Command phase, if this model is on the battlefield, you gain 1CP.
